If this effect isn't removed for 2 turns, remove it at the end of the turn.

dataList.name: Declared Duel
dataList.desc: In a clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power, and gains 1 Haste next turn after a successful attack.
